text: Sybil Christopher (27 March 1929 â€“ 7 March 2013) was a Welsh actress, theatre director and founder of a nightclub. She first became known as Richard Burton's first wife. She performed mostly on stage. She also acted in a few movies. Christopher was born Sybil Williams in Tylorstown, Wales. She died at age 83 in New York City.
